alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 11:15PM CDT until May 02 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1115 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Panhandle, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... White Deer, Groom, Lefors, Kingsmill and Lake Mcclellan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
